languages.english-overview:
Rico is an open source JavaScript library for developing rich Internet applications (RIAs) that use Ajax.
Rico uses the Prototype Javascript Framework and JSON libraries.
Rico is provided free and open-source (Apache 2.0 License) for either your personal or commercial use.
languages.english-features:
Animation Effects
Behaviors
Styling
Drag And Drop
AJAX Support
Browser Compatibility
Rico has been tested on IE 5.5, IE 6, Firefox 1.0x/Win, Camino/Mac, Firefox 1.5x/Mac
